member.name: IPlayToControl.Connect
member.summary: Connects the media element to the media sharing engine.
member.param: A pointer to the interface. The media element uses this interface to create the Sharing Engine.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPlayToControl.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the media element from the media sharing engine.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPlayToControl
member.summary: Enables the PlayToConnection object to connect to a media element.
